Title: Establishes the strengthen homes program
Summary: Establishes the strengthen homes program to promote the strengthening of homes in order to protect against severe weather through remodeling grants and insurance discounts.
LawCode: Add Art 6 §§601 - 603, Ins L; add §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the strengthen homes program
